name: stencilbox
description: StencilBox is a self-hosted visual editor for creating SVG stencils and diagrams, offering drag-and-drop elements and export options.
features: SVG editor: Creates and edits SVG stencils and diagrams visually.
Drag-and-drop: Adds shapes and elements with intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
Shape library: Provides pre-built shapes for flowcharts, diagrams, and designs.
Layer management: Organizes elements in layers for complex compositions.
Export options: Saves designs as SVG, PNG, or PDF formats.
Grid and guides: Aligns elements precisely with grid and guide lines.
Color picker: Applies colors to shapes with visual color picker.
Text support: Adds and styles text labels within diagrams.
Grouping: Groups multiple elements for easier manipulation.
Undo/redo: Reverts changes with unlimited undo and redo history.
Responsive canvas: Adjusts canvas size for different output requirements.
Template system: Starts projects from pre-made templates.
